title: One designer, two designer
creator_credit: Alexander Stitt, Phillip Adams and Industrial Design Council of Australia
brief_description: This animated short film comically explores the importance of good design and the pitfalls of impractical design. It discusses the function of designers and designs, emphasising the need for the consumer to be more critical and thoroughly check each product before purchasing and the value of looking past attractive advertising slogans.
